message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL 

The paper discusses the use of loss functions in deep neural networks for classification tasks, which is a common topic in machine learning and computer vision research (cs.LG, cs.CV). The paper also explores the theoretical justification for using L1 and L2 losses as classification objectives (cs.AI), and introduces new loss functions that can be used as alternatives to existing ones (cs.NE, cs.CL).
